info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 16 at 11:33PM PST until November 17 at 12:30AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
info.description:
FFWMTR
The National Weather Service in San Francisco has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Pickett burn area in... West Central Napa County in northern California...
* Until 1230 AM PST.
* At 1133 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Pickett Burn Area. Up to 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Rain rates are likely to exceed 0.3" in 15 minutes with flash flooding likely across the Pickett Fire Burn Scar.
Excessive rainfall over the burn area will result in debris flow moving through the Simmons Canyon and areas near and between Pickett Road to Silverado Trail. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Pickett Burn Area.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Pickett Burn Area.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Mainly rural areas of West Central Napa County.
info.instruction: This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Pickett Burn Area. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 12:30 AM PST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 12:30 AM PST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 12:30 AM PST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 12:30 AM PST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
